授業目的:
Features of Casual Spoken English
The purpose of this course is to familiarize students with common features of casual spoken English that differ from more formal, or academic, English
到達目標:
Students will be able to explore examples of casual spoken English for common features
Students will be able to contrast casual spoken English with more formal varieties
